structure.unit: A UNIFORM MILITARY AND OVERSEAS VOTERS ACT

law.text: An application for a military-overseas ballot is timely if received by the close of business hours seven (7) days before the election. An application for a military-overseas ballot for a primary, whether or not timely, is effective as an application for a military-overseas ballot for the regular election.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 8, effective July 1, 2014.
